info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 3:30PM EST until January 29 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Berks, Lehigh and Northampton. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 3 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will become heavy at times tonight through Saturday morning. Snow will diminish west to east early Saturday afternoon. Some blowing and drifting of snow is possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
